item.title: CVE-2024-5405|2024-05-27T11:50:02.232Z -- wtriple -- winnmp
item.description: A vulnerability had been discovered in WinNMP 19.02 consisting of an XSS attack viaÂ /tools/redis.php page in the k, hash, key and p parameters. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to submit a specially crafted JavaScript payload for an authenticated user to retrieve their session details.
